# The `RedirectableMaterializationUnit` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/redirectablematerializationunit">RedirectableMaterializationUnit</a> materializes redirectable symbol by invoking <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/redirectablesymbolmanager/#adeba1076cb445206426dd27c5158c16c">RedirectableSymbolManager::emitRedirectableSymbols</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/materializationunit">MaterializationUnit</a></>}>
A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/materializationunit">MaterializationUnit</a> represents a set of symbol definitions that can be materialized as a group, or individually discarded (when overriding definitions are encountered). <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/materializationunit/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/redirectablematerializationunit">RedirectableMaterializationUnit</a> materializes redirectable symbol by invoking <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/redirectablesymbolmanager/#adeba1076cb445206426dd27c5158c16c">RedirectableSymbolManager::emitRedirectableSymbols</a>.

Definition at line 65 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/redirectionmanager-h">RedirectionManager.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### discard() {#a6a0f0c139fbc1606bec46f2f79193fc2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::orc::RedirectableMaterializationUnit::discard (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> &amp; JD, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/symbolstringptr">SymbolStringPtr</a> &amp; Name)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Implementations of this method should discard the given symbol from the source (e.g.

if the source is an LLVM IR <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> and the symbol is a function, delete the function body or mark it available externally).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/redirectionmanager-h/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/redirectionmanager-h">RedirectionManager.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
